thread.title: Airbus patents design that stacks passengers
thread.title_full: Airbus patents design that stacks passengers | www.kirotv.com

author: kirotv.com
title: Airbus patents design that stacks passengers
text:
Think flying is already cramped? Wait until you see this.
The plane manufacturer Airbus has filed a patent with the European Patent Office for a new design to seat passengers.
The patent filing shows a passenger arrangement with seats on lower level and upper level, which has passengers stacked on top of each other.
Airbus says â€œIt is very important from an economic point of view to make optimum use of the available space in a passenger cabin."
According to CBS News , a representative told The Telegraph that the patent "does not mean they are necessarily going to be adopted into an aircraft design. This preserves the innovation and idea."
